document_data.caption: ''Various depictions of darts''
document_data.name: Dart
document_data.mainbody: A '''dart''' is a small sharp implement intended to be used as a ranged weapon, either to be thrown or blown from a [[blowpipe]].

Varieties.[[Acid dart]]: A hollow dart that breaks on impact, causing acid damage.
Varieties.[[Barbed dart]]: A heavy fletched dart often used by [[lizardfolk]].
Varieties.[[Stun dart]]: A hollow dart that releases poison gas on impact.

document_data.Notable Darts:
* ''[[Asp's Nest]]'': a variety of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[poison]]ed dart that was created by a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]].
* ''[[Dart of Fire]]'': a variety of enchanted darts that unleashed [[fire|elemental fire]].
* ''[[Dart of Ice]]'': a variety of enchanted darts that unleashed elemental ice.
* ''[[Static dart]]'': a variety of enchanted darts that unleashed a small burst of electrical energy.
